2.caption_en:
A long, horizontal coral-red arrow points to the right across a white background. The arrow consists of a rectangular shaft with a triangular head and spans almost the full width of the image.

{
  "artifact_type": "arrow",
  "color": "coral-red",
  "direction": "right",
  "orientation": "horizontal",
  "shape_description": "rectangular shaft with triangular arrowhead at the right end",
  "fill": "solid",
  "edge_style": "sharp",
  "background_color": "white",
  "position": "centered vertically, spans nearly full width",
  "size_percent": {
    "width": 98,
    "height": 8
  }
}
